alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:29PM MST until August 07 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 428 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Three Points, or 10 miles northwest of Sahuarita, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Drexel Heights, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Valencia West, Summit, Tucson Estates, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
